r.s: APM and distributed tracing for PHP
r.d: The Datadog PHP Tracer brings APM and distributed tracing to PHP.
r.n: ### Fixed - Do not diagnostics when ddtrace is disabled #1434 - Fix json symbol address resolving logic #1432 - Disable tracing when PHP is executed during RINIT #1429 - Change Predis integration type to "redis" #1427
